description_html:
Now Hiring: Respite Provider in Eau Claire, WI!
Pay Rate: $14.13/hour
Hours: 8 per week

Are you energetic, dependable, and love spending time with kids? We’re searching for a fun, active Respite Provider to support an adventurous, elementary-aged boy in Eau Claire. If you enjoy getting out into the community, staying active, and making a difference, this role is for you!

About the Role
You’ll get to spend your time doing things he loves—including:
• Heading out for exciting community outings (he even has an Action City pass!)
• Playing games together—yes, video games count as bonding time!
• Enjoying outdoor activities, parks, and anything that keeps you both moving
• Creating a safe, positive, and encouraging environment

We’re Looking for Someone Who Is:
• Responsible, reliable, and upbeat
• Ready to engage in both indoor fun and outdoor adventures
• Patient, supportive, and comfortable connecting with kids of different energy levels

Why You’ll Love This Job
• Flexible, low-hour commitment—perfect for students, part-time workers, or anyone seeking meaningful work
• A chance to make a real, positive impact while having fun
• Every shift is a mix of activity, connection, and creativity

description_html:
Job Title: Respite Provider (Elk Mound)
Hours: 4–6 hours per week
Rate of Pay: $14.13/hour
Schedule: 1–2 days per week, preferably Fridays; after-school hours

About the Role
We are seeking a reliable, active, and patient respite provider to support a young person in the Elk Mound area. This position involves after-school pickup and spending 1–2 hours together engaging in meaningful, enjoyable activities. The goal is to provide a supportive, calm, and structured environment.

Responsibilities
• Pick up from school and provide supervision for 1–2 hours after school
• Engage in hands-on, active, or creative activities based on his interests
• Participate in outdoor activities such as biking, fishing, or using the YMCA pass
• Provide a structured, calm environment with low sensory overload

About Him
Interests:
• Very athletic; enjoys physical activity and “work”-type tasks
• Hands-on activities, arts and crafts, building projects
• Outdoorsy—BMX biking, fishing, exploring
• Has a family YMCA membership
• Curious and currently very interested in Mexican culture
Dislikes / Sensitivities:
• Big crowds, loud/noisy environments, or chaotic spaces
• Certain foods (specifics can be discussed during onboarding)

What We’re Looking For
• Someone dependable, calm, and patient
• Knowledgeable about the outdoors, sports, and hands-on activities
• Familiarity with or interest in Mexican culture is a plus
• Experience working with youth or respite care is helpful but not required

description_html:
Calling All Kind Humans & Caregiving Heroes! 
Child Respite Provider Needed – Rothschild, WI

Do you like working with children, remaining active and doing fun activities? 
Are you talkative, goofy and playful?
Then this might be the perfect part-time gig for you!

We’re looking for a Respite Provider for a sweet, creative, and energetic young girl in or near Rothschild to assist in keeping up with her active lifestyle while Mom and Dad get a break.

About This Awesome Kid:
• Loves dolls, play doh and coloring
• Big fan of Masha and the Bear! 
• Enjoys dance, swimming, and remaining engaged

Schedule & Pay:
• 20 hours per month
• After school on weekdays/occasional weekends
• $12.60/hour

Location: Rothschild, WI
• Potential for Child Care Hours as well during school break

What You’ll Do:
• Build trust through patience, kindness, and communication
• Keep her engaged with fun, active, and creative activities
• Encourage her love for swimming, dance, and creative play
• Provide assistance or reminders for ADLs as needed

You’d Be a Great Fit If You Are:
• Kind, patient, and energetic
• Comfortable being active and outdoors
• Strong communicator
• Flexible and adaptable
• Experience in First Aid and CPR is a plus — but not required!

Requirements:
• Valid driver’s license & reliable transportation
• Willing to complete a caregiver background check

This is a rewarding, low-hour opportunity to make a real difference in a child’s life — while having fun doing it.
